name: Plasma Fist
description:
Use your plasma fist to blast through enemies, climb ladders, and collect coins & treasure chests as you traverse all 7 levels of the purple dungeon!

Plasma Fist was primarily inspired by Loderunner and Spelunky.

Controls: Arrow keys - movement, Tap X - shoot small blast, Hold X and then release - shoot large blast, Escape - Pause game.

Music by Nicholas Short

Ending Music by Lunacore

Special thanks to Harrk and Zack Banack for gametesting.
